item.description:
Baroque chamber music performed on period instruments. Works by Geminiani, Kummer, Corelli, Monteverdi, Janitsch, Telemann, and W. F. Bach. Free.

When I posted this event on the website, I also sent an email to everyone in the group. The email has details about location, parking, composers, etc. If you'd like me to send it to you again, use the link next to "Who's hosting?"
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the small EU flag (about 4 inches x 6 inches)

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Italian & German Chamber Music
